name: Philo-dev
tagline: Machine-corrected versions of the works of Philo Judaeus, the Hellenistic Jewish philosopher.
body:
#Welcome to philo-dev!

##About
This repository hosts digital versions of public-domain editions of the works of Philo Judaeus, the Hellenistic Jewish philosopher.

The XML files were produced by data entry company [Digital Divide Data](http://www.digitaldividedata.org/) (DDD), who OCR'd, corrected and encoded each print volume in accordance with the latest [EpiDoc](http://sourceforge.net/p/epidoc/wiki/Home/) standards. While adequate, more can and should be done to improve the XML (the -dev(elopment) suffix indicates the repository is open to improvement).

##Contents
* [Philonis Alexandrini Opera quae supersunt. Vol. 1](https://github.com/OpenGreekAndLatin/philo-dev/blob/master/philo_1.xml): _De Opificio Mundi_, _Legum Allegoriarum Lib. I-III_, _De Cherubim_, _De Sacrificiis Abelis et Caini_, _Quod Deterius Potiori Insidiari Soleat_ (1896) Ed. Leopold Cohn & Paul Wendland. Berlin: Berolini Reimer.
* [Philonis Alexandrini Opera quae supersunt. Vol. 2](https://github.com/OpenGreekAndLatin/philo-dev/blob/master/philo_2.xml):  _De Posteritate Caini_, _De Gigantibus_, _Quod Deus Sit Immutabilis_, _De Agricultura_, _De Plantatione_, _De Ebrietate_, _De Sobrietate_, _De Confusione Linguarum_, _De Migratione Abrahami_ (1897) Ed. Leopold Cohn & Paul Wendland. Berlin: Berolini Reimer. 
* [Philonis Alexandrini Opera quae supersunt. Vol. 3](https://github.com/OpenGreekAndLatin/philo-dev/blob/master/philo_3.xml): _Quis Rerum Divinarum Heres Sit_, _De Congressu Eruditionis Gratia_, _De Fuga et Inventione_, _De Mutatione Nominum_, _De Somniis Liber I_, _De Somniis Liber II_ (1898) Ed. Leopold Cohn & Paul Wendland. Berlin: Berolini Reimer. 
* [Philonis Alexandrini Opera quae supersunt. Vol. 4](https://github.com/OpenGreekAndLatin/philo-dev/blob/master/philo_4.xml): _De Abrahamo, De Iosepho, De Vita Mosis Lib. I, De Vita Mosis Lib. II, De Decalogo_ (1902) Ed. Leopold Cohn & Paul Wendland. Berlin: Berolini Reimer.
* [Philonis Alexandrini Opera quae supersunt. Vol. 6](https://github.com/OpenGreekAndLatin/philo-dev/blob/master/philo_6.xml):  _Quod Omnis Probus Liber Sit_, _De Vita Contemplativa_, _De Aeternitate Mundi_, _In Flaccum_, _Legatio ad Gaium_ (1915) Ed. Leopold Cohn & Paul Wendland. Berlin: Berolini Reimer.
* [Philonis Alexandrini Opera quae supersunt. Vol. 7](https://github.com/OpenGreekAndLatin/philo-dev/blob/master/philo_7.xml): _Indices ad Opera_ (1926) Ed. Leopold Cohn & Paul Wendland. Berlin: Berolini Reimer.
* _[Fragments of Philo Judaeus](https://github.com/OpenGreekAndLatin/philo-dev/blob/master/philo_1886.xml)_ (1886) Ed. Rendel Harris. Cambridge: Cambridge University Press.
* [Philonis Judaei Opera Omnia. Vol. 5, part 2](https://github.com/OpenGreekAndLatin/philo-dev/blob/master/philoOmnia_5_2.xml): _De mercede meretricis_, _Libb. I-III De specialibus legibus_, _De septenario_, _De festo Cophini_, _De parentibus colendis_, _De iudice_, _De concupiscentia_, _De iustitia_, _De creatione principum_, _De fortitudine_, _De caritate_, _De poenitentia_, _De praemiis et poenis_, _De execratione_, _De nobilitate_, _Quod omnis probus liber_, _De vita contemplativa_ (1828) ed. Carl Ernst Richter. Leipzig: Sumtibus E.B. Schwickerti.
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
